data.what_is: DreamCampaigns all-in-one email & SMS marketing tools enable you to send super personalized, optimized, responsive & beautiful emails & text campaigns in just a few clicks. Trigger personalized emails & SMS based on customer actions and send automated follow-ups. Respond to customer behavior and boost calls to action with messages directly on your site. Grow your business with features like unlimited previews, email Deliverability Score, automated segmentation and marketing automation.
data.product_description: DreamCampaigns all-in-one email & SMS marketing tools enable you to send super personalized, optimized, responsive & beautiful emails & text campaigns in just a few clicks. Trigger personalized emails & SMS based on customer actions and send automated follow-ups. Respond to customer behavior and boost calls to action with messages directly on your site. Grow your business with features like unlimited previews, email Deliverability Score, automated segmentation and marketing automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Complete email marketing solution with fairly good performance but has a room for improvement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about DreamCampaigns?
As a blogger and writer email campaigns form a major part of marketing for me. I liked its nice and simple interface that allows for intuitive navigation and easy makes it easy and quick to work with. Besides, it also allows me to connect seamlessly with a variety of apps I work with, right from CRM to analytics, marketing and popular e-commerce site builders like Shopify. I am also impressed by a fairly wide array of different templates to choose from which is a great treasure for non-designers like me. It saves me from any creative dilemma or barriers. The Revenue Target feature allows me to focus better on my RoI factor. Overall I am fairly satisfied as far as my needs are concerned. I also loved its sms sending option which makes sms campaigns easier and more focused.

What do you dislike about DreamCampaigns?
While the Automated Journey creation tool can be helpful, it still needs improvement in the overall performance delivery and some Pro features. A properly guided process needs to be in place for people with basic knowledge about automation like me. Besides, I think they need to add more options and criteria to the list of  trigger points

What problems is DreamCampaigns solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am using it for automating and speeding up my email campaigns and in the future will use it for better SMS campaigns too. It has not only allowed me to reduce my efforts but has also allowed me to focus better on the overall RoI of my campaigns.
